headline: Analysts Cut ServiceNow (NOW) Price Targets But Stay Positive
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the 10 Best NYSE Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On January 8, Wells Fargo reduced its price target on ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) from $255 to $225 but kept its Overweight rating on the stock. Earlier, on January 5, RBC Capital also lowered its price target on ServiceNow, Inc. […]

headline: Piper Sandler Lowers PT on ServiceNow (NOW) Stock
summary: ServiceNow, Inc. (NYSE:NOW) is one of the Oversold Fundamentally Strong Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 5, Piper Sandler analyst Rob Owens reduced the firm’s price objective on the company’s stock to $200 from $230, while keeping an “Overweight” rating.
